data.title: CHIEFS OF STATE AND CABINET MEMBERS OF FOREIGN GOVERNMENTS
data.text: Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Directorate of Intelligence Chiefs of State and Cabinet Members of Foreign Governments CR CS 85-002 (Supersedes CR CS 85-001) February 1985 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 This publication is prepared for the use of US Government officials, and the format, coverage, and content are designed to meet their specific requirements. US Government officials may obtain additional copies of this document directly or through liaison channels from the Central Intelligence Agency. Requesters outside the US Government may obtain subscriptions to CIA publications similar to this one by addressing inquiries to: Document Expediting (DOCEX) Project Exchange and Gift Division Library of Congress Washington, D.C. 20540 National Technical Information Service 5285 Port Royal Road Springfield, VA 22161 Requesters outside the US Government not interested in subscription service may purchase specific publications either in paper copy or microform from: National Technical Information Service 5285 Port Royal Road Springfield, VA 22161 (To expedite service call the NTIS Order Desk (703) 4871650) Photoduplication Service Library of Congress Washington, D.C. 20540 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86S00596R000200810001-9 A NOTE TO ALL SUBSCRIBERS: The enclosed copy of the Chiefs of State and Cabinet Members of Foreign Governments marks the final issue to be produced on a monthly basis. Future editions of this directory will be available on a bimonthly basis, with issues appearing in February, April, June, August, October, and December of each year. Please note that, as a result of this change in the production schedule, you will not receive copies of the Chiefs of State during the month of March. The March/April 1985 issue, however, will be available during the first week of April. Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86S00596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Directorate of Intelligence Chiefs of State and Cabinet Members of Foreign Governments Information received as of 9 January 1985 has been used in preparing this directory: significant changes received between then and 15 January 1985 have been made in the country section, but not in the index. CR CS 85-002 (Supersedes CR CS 85-001) February 1985 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 This directory identifying Chiefs of State and Cabinet members of foreign governments is based upon information current as of the publication date. (The index, however, will not include last-minute changes.) Completely revised editions are issued each month. Upon being replaced, the obsolete directories should be destroyed. Because it is intended primarily as a reference aid this publication includes as many governments of the world as is considered practicable, some of them not yet fully independent and others not officially recognized by the United States. Regimes with which there are no diplomatic exchanges are indicated by the initials "NDE." For the convenience of the user, a key to abbreviations is included. Governments are listed in alphabetical order according to the most commonly used version of each country's name. The spellings of the personal names in this directory follow transliteration systems generally agreed upon by US Government agencies, except when officials use or have stated a preference for alternate spellings of their names or when the news media or official documents issued by an individual's country use an alternate spelling. Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 Approved For Release 2011/02/16: CIA-RDP86SO0596R000200810001-9 KEY TO ABBREVIATIONS Fed. Federal Admin.
